S:log-item.D:comment:
Merging revision 629395 from trunk into 10.3 codeline. The reason for merge is I would like to merge changes for DERBY-3304 (629926) into trunk but that revision depends on DERBY-3404 (629712) which depends on DERBY-3422 (629395)
The commit comments for 629395 were as follows
DERBY-3422: Embedded returns wrong value for DatabaseMetaData.autoCommitFailureClosesAllResultSets()
Return the correct value (true) and update the test so that it is able to detect differences between returned value and actual behaviour.
